definition: to do/to grow/to write or compose/to pretend/to regard as/to feel/writings or works

sentences.english: Write your answers in blue or black ink.
This is an easy question for a Chinese to ask, but a Westerner might find it difficult to answer.
sentences.chinese: 這是一箇中國人常問的問題，而西方人卻很難作答。

sentences.english: I answer with prearranged hand signals.
sentences.chinese: 我用事先安排好的手勢作答。

sentences.english: No one in the office promised a quick answer to the matter.
sentences.chinese: 辦公室沒人答應對此事從速作答。

sentences.english: Your homework must be printed on A4 paper with answers given in blue ball pens.
sentences.chinese: 功課必須用A4紙印出來，用藍色原子筆作答。

sentences.english: Same as ever, I replied automatically.
sentences.chinese: 和以前一樣，我機械地作答。

sentences.english: Watson got its clues via electronic text.
sentences.chinese: 沃森通過電子文本獲得作答的線索。

sentences.english: Very well, I begin to cipher out the German for that answer.
sentences.chinese: 好吧，我開始搜腸刮肚嘗試用德語作答。

sentences.english: Chi Beichen Xiang Anlin confession, but this moment Anlin heart hesitation, no answer.
sentences.chinese: 池北辰向安霖表白，而此刻安霖內心猶豫，沒有作答。

sentences.english: Mr. Bernanke, how do you respond?
sentences.chinese: 伯南克先生，你將會如何作答呢？

sentences.english: His wife looked up at him quickly, but made no reply.
sentences.chinese: 露西婭很快地擡頭看了他一眼，沒有作答。

sentences.english: Don't be afraid to call on those who may look like they want to speak.
sentences.chinese: 不要害怕去叫那些看起來有話要說的同學作答。

sentences.english: Do not worry about your answers.
Nevertheless, I cannot answer for her.
The direct conservative attacks are easy to answer.
sentences.chinese: 對於直接而保守的攻擊，我們容易作答。

definition: to draw up the theme (for discussion)
an examiner/an official conducting an exam
(idiom) to sidestep the question/to answer evasively
exam candidate/student whose name has been put forward for an exam
to question/to ask/to raise a question
to compete to be the first to answer a question (as on a quiz show)
topic/problem for discussion/exam question/subject/to inscribe/to mention/CL:個|个[ge4],道[dao4]
